allow: Bash(cmd //c "dir /b ""C:\\Program Files\\Java"" 2>nul || dir /b ""C:\\Program Files \(x86\)\\Java"" 2>nul || echo No Java found")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix game engine physics to match original Java implementation

- Change ball from circle to 20x20 rectangular hitbox
- Implement three-zone paddle collision \(left/center/right\)
- Fix wall bounds to match original \(x<0, x>670, y<0, y>570\)
- Scale velocities for 60 FPS \(2x original 125 FPS values\)
- Add proper event listener cleanup in destroy\(\)
- Remove roundRect\(\) for browser compatibility
- Add paddleHitThisFrame flag to prevent multiple collisions
- Reset input state on game start
- Add bounds clamping for touch controls

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(cmd /c "dir /b /s C:\\Program Files\\Java\\*javac.exe 2>nul || dir /b /s C:\\Program Files \(x86\)\\Java\\*javac.exe 2>nul || echo No Java found in Program Files")
Bash(cmd /c "echo %JAVA_HOME% && if exist ""%JAVA_HOME%\\bin\\javac.exe"" echo Found JAVA_HOME")
